title: Broccoli Cheese Soup Recipe
description: This creamy broccoli cheese soup is easy to prepare and popular with all ages. The generous batch is ideal for entertaining, or for planned leftovers.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Vegetable Soup Recipes Broccoli Soup Recipes Broccoli Cheese Soup 4.6 (3,162) 2,419 Reviews 479 Photos This broccoli cheese soup is very flavorful. It's great for serving at luncheons or special gatherings with a quiche. To make it a little fancier, add 1 cup sliced mushrooms and 1 cup white wine with the onions. By The Allrecipes Community The Allrecipes Community The Allrecipes Community includes over 15 million home cooks around the world who contribute recipes to our ever-growing library. Beyond submitting their personal recipes for publication, members of this supportive, food-driven community actively inspire one another through the photos, reviews, and videos they share. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on September 19, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 479 479 479 479 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 25 mins Total Time: 35 mins Servings: 12 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings ½ cup butter 1 onion, chopped 1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli 4 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth 1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed 2 cups milk 1 tablespoon garlic powder ⅔ cup cornstarch 1 cup water Directions Gather all ingredients. Allrecipes/Qi Ai Melt butter in a stockpot over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Stir in broccoli. Allrecipes/Qi Ai Add broth and simmer until broccoli is tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Allrecipes/Qi Ai Reduce heat; add cheese cubes and stir until melted. Stir in milk and garlic powder. Allrecipes/Qi Ai Stir cornstarch and water together in a small bowl until smooth. Stir into soup; cook, stirring frequently, until thick. Serve and enjoy! Allrecipes/Qi Ai I Made It Print 5,368 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 265 Calories 18g Fat 15g Carbs 10g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 12 Calories 265 % Daily Value * Total Fat 18g 23% Saturated Fat 11g 55% Cholesterol 57mg 19% Sodium 1136mg 49% Total Carbohydrate 15g 5% Dietary Fiber 1g 4% Total Sugars 6g Protein 10g 20% Vitamin C 17mg 19% Calcium 275mg 21% Iron 1mg 3% Potassium 193mg 4% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Broccoli Cheese Soup 01 of 479 Photo by  Allrecipes/Qi Ai 02 of 479 Photo by  LovesCooking 09/18/2024 Great flavors A keeper! This recipe truly is what a broccoli cheese soup should taste like. It nails the flavor profile masterfully. The richness from the cheese and the freshness from the broccoli balance each other perfectly. I’d suggest enjoying this soup paired with a full bodied buttery chardonnay, what a great start to a dinner party ! It would also be heavenly with some garlic bread on the side. 03 of 479 Photo by  TwistyYuzu5889 01/14/2024 I added mushrooms and shredded carrots to the butter and onions. I cooked it in a cup of white wine. I used 2lb of cheese and 64 oz of chicken broth. Finished it with fresh carrot, parsley, and parmasen cheese. 04 of 479 Photo by  SnazzyPear9467 01/05/2024 Added shredded carrots & little extra garlic.... otherwise I Made it exactly as directed.... .. Family & Friends really liked it 05 of 479 Photo by  JustinSLC 12/10/2023 I cut this recipe in half and made some modifications. It turned out to be a keeper. First, I used fresh broccoli (about 3 or 4 cups). An immersion blender is good for breaking up the broccoli (but not too much). I also used real cheddar cheese instead of the processed stuff. I think this made the biggest difference. I used a mix of 1/3 sharp cheddar to 2/3 mild. I used 1 cup of whole milk and added another 1/4 cup half & half. The recipe doesn't mention salt, but you should add a fair amount at the end, depending on how salty the cheese was. I added a teaspoon, then more when I served it. I still used 2/3 cups of cornstarch and 1 cup water to account for some of the additional liquid. It turned out thick and chowder-like with a prominent cheesy flavor. Very good with crackers. 06 of 479 Photo by  Dani B 12/07/2023 Ridiculously simple and very delicious!Used my favorite chicken base to make some of the broth a little bit more flavorful. Used 1cup heavy cream instead of the 2cups of milk. Added a tablespoon of Lawry’s Salt-Free17 seasoning while the broccoli was cooking.Soup is Amazeballs! 😍 07 of 479 Photo by  FunkyOats8003 12/07/2023 I used Velveeta Cheese instead of Cheddar. Yes, I know it's not the healthiest but I've had 4 people tell me my Broccoli and Cheese Soup tatses BETTER than Panera's! 08 of 479 Photo by  MomHaag 10/19/2023 Fantastic! My family loves it! 09 of 479 Photo by  Jilan Hosmanek-Leschke 10/12/2023 Used the recipe as a guideline & versed it to my liking. Added chopped carrots, celery and used heavy cream instead of milk. I also doubled it. Love at first taste!!😋 10 of 479 Photo by  Soup Loving Nicole 09/05/2023 Made as written to start with but ended up skipping step 3. It didn't need it. I found the broccoli ratio to be spot on. This was super easy and one I would make again. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love The Real Copycat Panera Broccoli Cheddar Soup 25 Ratings Broccoli Potato Soup 61 Ratings Cheese Soup with Broccoli 202 Ratings Mom's Broccoli Cheese Soup 13 Ratings Gluten-Free Broccoli and Cheese Soup Cheesy Broccoli and Vegetable Soup 73 Ratings Gouda and Broccoli Soup 11 Ratings Roasted Broccoli Cheese Soup 16 Ratings Easiest Broccoli Soup EVER 7 Ratings Instant Pot Broccoli Cheese Soup 3 Ratings Slow Cooker Cheesy Broccoli Soup 2 Ratings Keto Broccoli Cheddar Soup 9 Ratings Erin's Cheesy Broccoli Soup 186 Ratings Vegan Broccoli Soup 185 Ratings Broccoli Soup au Gratin 6 Ratings Low Carb Broccoli Soup 10 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
